projects.name: Potato Plant Disease Recognition Web Application
projects.description: Developed a web app using Python, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning to identify diseases in potato plant leaves. Implemented Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) for precise disease identification. Enhanced potato crop health, reduced disease-related losses, and contributed to agricultural productivity and food security.

projects.name: Voice-Activated Conversational AI Bot
projects.description: Developed a Conversational AI bot with voice recognition capabilities. Recognizes voice commands and responds accordingly. Integrates with social media accounts to access and provide real-time information.

projects.name: Movie Recommendation System
projects.description: Developing a content-based movie recommendation system. Recommends movies based on users viewing history. Utilizes movie tags for enhanced search functionality.
